/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[Usp_GerVerticalConfigsByType]    Script Date: 09/30/2013 23:25:30 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- =============================================
-- Author:		<Author,,Name>
-- Create date: <Create Date,,>
-- Description:	<Description,,>
-- =============================================
ALTER PROCEDURE [dbo].[Usp_GerVerticalConfigsByType]
(
	@Vertical varchar(100),
	@Type varchar(20)
)
AS
BEGIN
	-- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from
	-- interfering with SELECT statements.
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	DECLARE @DomainID INT
	SET @DomainID=(SELECT ID FROM L_Domain_Verticals WHERE Vertical=@Vertical)
    IF @DomainID IS NOT NULL
		BEGIN
			SELECT Name,Value FROM L_Domain_Configs WHERE Domain_ID=@DomainID AND Type=@Type
		END	
END

USE [USPDHUB ]
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[usp_CopySurvey]    Script Date: 10/29/2013 11:31:08 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- =============================================
-- Author:		<MALLI>
-- Create date: <28-10-2013>
-- Description:	<Copy Survey>
-- =============================================
ALTER PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_CopySurvey]
( 
	@UserID INT,
	@CreatedUserID INT,
	@OldSurveyID INT,
	@NewSurveyName VARCHAR(200)
)
AS
BEGIN
	-- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from
	-- interfering with SELECT statements.
SET NOCOUNT ON;
DECLARE @NewSurveyID INT=0
Declare @QID int=0
Declare @OptId int=0
-- *** Checking if new survey name is alrady exists or not *** --
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT Name FROM T_Manage_Surveys WHERE Name=@NewSurveyName AND UserID=@UserID) -- *** if not exists *** --
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_Manage_Surveys ([ProfileID]
		  ,[UserID]
		  ,[Name]
		  ,[Description]
		  ,[STypeID]
		  ,[Thanks_Message]      
		  ,[IsDeleted]
		  ,[Created_Date]
		  ,[Created_User]
		  ,[Modified_Date]
		  ,[Modified_User])
		SELECT [ProfileID]
		  ,[UserID]
		  ,@NewSurveyName
		  ,[Description]
		  ,[STypeID]
		  ,[Thanks_Message]      
		  ,[IsDeleted]
		  ,GETDATE()
		  ,@CreatedUserID
		  ,GETDATE()
		  ,@CreatedUserID
		FROM T_Manage_Surveys WHERE Survey_ID= @OldSurveyID
		SET @NewSurveyID=SCOPE_IDENTITY()
		-- *** inserting questions based on old survey ID *** --
		INSERT INTO dbo.T_Survey_Questions  (Text,
			QTypeID, 
			SurveyID,
			Status,
			Created_Date,    
			Creadted_User,
			Modified_Date, 
			Modified_User)
		SELECT
			Text,  
			QTypeID,
			@NewSurveyID,
			Status,
			GETDATE(),
			@CreatedUserID,
			GETDATE(),
			@CreatedUserID
		FROM dbo.T_Survey_Questions TSQ  WHERE TSQ.SurveyID = @OldSurveyID
	CREATE TABLE #QuestionTable
	(
		Id int
	)
	INSERT INTO #QuestionTable SELECT Question_ID From T_Survey_Questions Where SurveyID=@OldSurveyID 
	CREATE TABLE #OptionsTable
	(
		Id int
	)
	INSERT INTO #OptionsTable SELECT Question_ID From T_Survey_Questions Where SurveyID=@NewSurveyID 
	/*******************************************************/
	While((Select Count(*) From #QuestionTable)>0)
	BEGIN
	Set @QID=(Select Top 1 Id From #QuestionTable)
	set @OptId=(Select Top 1 Id From #OptionsTable)
	INSERT INTO dbo.T_SurveyQuestion_Options  
	(  
		QuestionID,
		SurveyID, 
		Answer_Option,
		Order_No,
		IsDeleted,    
		Created_Date,
		Created_User, 
		Modified_Date,
		Modified_User)
	SELECT
		@OptId,  
		@NewSurveyID,
		Answer_Option,
		Order_No,
		IsDeleted,
		GETDATE(),
		@UserID,
		GETDATE(),
		@UserID

	FROM dbo.T_SurveyQuestion_Options TSQO  
	WHERE TSQO.SurveyID = @OldSurveyID AND QuestionID = @QID
	/*******************************************************/
	Delete From #QuestionTable Where Id=@QID
	Delete From #OptionsTable where Id=@OptId
	END
	Delete #QuestionTable
	Delete #OptionsTable
	END	
	SELECT @NewSurveyID
END

============================================== Start of 1.6 ==============================================================

-- Message Blocking                                                                                   --Completed

INSERT INTO [USPDHUB ].[dbo].[L_Help_Content]
           ([Help_Name]
           ,[IsMaster]
           ,[Master_ID]
           ,[Help_content]
           ,[IsActive]
           ,[Video_File]
           ,[Pdf_Name])
     VALUES
           ('Message Blocking'
           ,'False'
           ,86
           ,'<span style="color: #005AA0; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 15px;
        font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 5px; margin-top: 5px; text-transform: uppercase;">
        Message Blocking</span>
    <br />
    <br />
    <span style="font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 15px; word-wrap: break-word;">
        If you receive prank or abusive messages you have the ability to block messages 
		from that particular device. Blocked users will still be able to use your 
		app but are unable to send messages.
	</span>
    <br />
    <br />
    <span style="font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 15px;">From the Dashboard
        or Menu:</span>
    <br />
    <br />
    <table style="font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; line-height: 22px; font-size: 15px;
        padding-left: 25px;" width="100%">
        <tr>
            <td valign="bottom">
                1.
            </td>
            <td>
                Select ''Messages''.
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/Messages.jpg">
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td valign="top">
                2.
            </td>
            <td>
                Check the box next to the senders message that you wish to block.
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td colspan="2" align="center">
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/SelectAllMsgs.jpg">
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td valign="bottom">
                3.
            </td>
            <td>
                Select ''Block Sender'' at the bottom of the screen.
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/BlocksenderBtn.jpg">
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="bottom">
                4.
            </td>
            <td>
                Click ''OK''.
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/OK.jpg">
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="top">
                5.
            </td>
            <td>
                The sender will now be blocked from sending messages unless you unblock them.
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>'
           ,'True'
           ,NULL
           ,'MessageBlocking.pdf')
GO

INSERT INTO [USPDHUB ].[dbo].[L_Help_Content]
           ([Help_Name]
           ,[IsMaster]
           ,[Master_ID]
           ,[Help_content]
           ,[IsActive]
           ,[Video_File]
           ,[Pdf_Name])
     VALUES
           ('Message Unblocking'
           ,'False'
           ,86
           ,'<span style="color: #005AA0; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 15px;
        font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 5px; margin-top: 5px; text-transform: uppercase;">
        Message Unblocking</span>
    <br />
    <br />
    <span style="font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 15px;">From the Dashboard
        or Menu:</span>
    <br />
    <br />
    <table style="font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; line-height: 22px; font-size: 15px;
        padding-left: 25px;" width="100%">
        <tr>
            <td valign="bottom">
                1.
            </td>
            <td>
                Select ''Mobile App''.
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/MobileApp.jpg">
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td valign="top">
                2.
            </td>
            <td>
                Select ''Manage Blocked Senders''.   
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td colspan="2" align="center">
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/ManageBlockedSenders.jpg">
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td valign="top">
                3.
            </td>
            <td>
                If you have more than one blocked sender you may identify him by clicking 
				on the box next to the device id number.
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td colspan="2" align="center">
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/BlockedDeviceID.jpg">
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="top">
                4.
            </td>
            <td>
                This will display the subject and message for that device.<br/>
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/DeviceSubjectMessage.jpg">
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="bottom">
                5.
            </td>
            <td>
                Select the checkbox next to the sender you wish to unblock.
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td colspan="2" align="center">
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/UnblockDevice.jpg">
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="bottom">
                6.
            </td>
            <td>
                Select ''Unblock Sender''. <img src="/Images/HelpImages/UnblockSender.jpg">
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>'
           ,'True'
           ,NULL
           ,'MessageUnblocking.pdf')

update L_Domains set Footer='<div id="footer">
            <div id="footerwrapper">
                <div id="footer-col1">
                    <a href="#RootPath#/Business/MyAccount/Default.aspx">
                        Dashboard</a><br />
                    <a href="#RootPath#/OP/#DomainName#/aboutus.html" target="_blank">About Us</a><br />
                    <a href="#RootPath#/OP/#DomainName#/contactus.aspx" target="_blank">Contact Us</a><br />
                    <a href="#RootPath#/OP/#DomainName#/Terms.html" target="_blank">Terms of Service</a>
                </div>
                <div id="footer-col2">
                    &nbsp;
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>' where Domain_ID=5


INSERT INTO L_Domain_Configs (Domain_ID, Type, Name, Value, IsActive)
SELECT 5, Type, Name, Value, IsActive 
FROM L_Domain_Configs where Domain_ID=2
update L_Domain_Configs set Value=REPLACE(Value, 'inschoolhub.com', 'myyouthhub.com') where Domain_ID=5

INSERT INTO L_Default_TabNames (Tab_Name, Tab_Parent, Domain_name)
SELECT Tab_Name, Tab_Parent, 'myyouthhubcom' 
FROM L_Default_TabNames where Domain_name='inschoolhubcom'

INSERT INTO L_Subscriptions (Category, Product_Type, Title, Description,RFP_Flag, Navigation_Path,Request_Type, Template_ID, Store_Image_Icon, Sub_Accounts_Flag, Active_Flag,Subscription_Cost, Subscription_period, Type, Email_Description, Order_ID)
SELECT Category, 'myyouthhubcom' , Title, Description,RFP_Flag, Navigation_Path,Request_Type, Template_ID, Store_Image_Icon, Sub_Accounts_Flag, Active_Flag,Subscription_Cost, Subscription_period, Type, Email_Description, Order_ID
FROM L_Subscriptions where Product_Type='inschoolhubcom'

replace the values for myyouthhub in L_Subscriptions

-- Change subscriptionID in L_Sub_Accounts_Subscriptions based on above insert

                For Survey type, select the ''Survey'' radio button. <img src="/Images/HelpImages/SurveyTypeSurvey.jpg" />
            </td>

				Enter a Thank you message that survey participants will read upon completing the survey. <img src="/Images/HelpImages/ThankYouMessage.jpg" />

            </td>
            <td>
				You may enter an expiration date  <img src="/Images/HelpImages/ExpirationDate.jpg" />  and the system will automatically remove the survey from the App on that date.
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="top">
                7.
            </td>
            <td>
                Choose whether you would like to display it on your App or keep it private by clicking the appropriate radio buttons.
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/PublicPrivate.jpg" />
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="bottom">
                8.
            </td>
            <td>
                Click ''Save & Continue''. <img src="/Images/HelpImages/SaveContinue.jpg" />
        </tr>
		 <tr>
            <td>
                9.
            </td>
            <td>
                Enter your first survey question in the question text box.
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td colspan="2" align="center">
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/PollQuestion.jpg" />
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="top">
                10.
            </td>
            <td>
				Select the type of answer your question requires by selecting the appropriate radio buttons. <img src="/Images/HelpImages/QuestionType.jpg" />    Check boxes allow users to check multiple answers; radio buttons allow only one answer and free text boxes provide for comments or detailed answers.
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="top">
                11.
            </td>
            <td>
				Enter your answer options.  If you need additional answer fields select ''Add''. <img src="/Images/HelpImages/AnswerOptions.jpg" />
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="bottom">
                12.
            </td>
            <td>
				Check the require answer box if you need a specific question answered.
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td colspan="2" align="center">
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/RequireAnswer.jpg" />
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				13.
			</td>
			<td>
				Select an answer option from the drop down and enter the number of answer choices in the box provided, e.g. Respondent must answer <u>at least 3</u> choices.
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
            <td colspan="2" align="center">
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/AnswersOptionDropdown.jpg" />
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
			<td valign="top">
				14.
			</td>
			<td>
				If a required question is not answered, a pre-populated error message will display that you may edit.
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
            <td colspan="2" align="center">
                <img src="/Images/HelpImages/RequiredQuestionErrorMessage.jpg" />
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="bottom">
                15.
            </td>
            <td>
				Select ''Save & Continue'' <img src="/Images/HelpImages/SaveContinue.jpg" />  to add additional questions.
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="bottom">
                16.
            </td>
            <td>
				Follow steps 9 thru 16 for each additional survey question.
            </td>
        </tr>
		<tr>
            <td valign="bottom">
                17.
            </td>
            <td>
				When you complete your survey, select ''Finish''. <img src="/Images/HelpImages/Finish.jpg" />
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>'
 WHERE Help_ID = 177
